name: Amphibia Sprite Game
description:
This is/will be a small, Megaman Zero/X inspired platformer game featuring characters and settings from the Cartoon Series “Amphibia”. I created it originally to see what my sprites would look like, but had a lot of fun, so I developed it further. In the current version there are two stages, a boss-fight centric stage, and a test stage. Please note that this version is likely going to be VERY buggy, and as of now there is no way to change volume of sounds/music in-game, except by changing the volume in Volume Mixer or using the volume keys/slider. There is also no way to rebind the controls, and thus, the game will probably not work that well with a gamepad.

If you find any bugs, make sure to let me know about them on Reddit (MrMrAltAccount1000) or the comment section.

UPDATE 10/31/20: Fixed a ton of pause-related bugs in Sasha's fight.
